climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Body Composition Analysis Get ready to crush your wellness goals with body readings right on your wrist. AdvancedSleep / Continuous SpO2 Manage your overall sleep quality for a great night's sleep with an advanced tracker that calculates your sleep score.

ECG Be smart about your heart with ECG Monitoring that gives accurate readings. Fitness / Auto Workout Tracking Make the most of every workout with Auto Workout Tracking. Stay motivated by connecting to live coaching sessions via your smartphone or to dynamic Group Challenges with your friends.
NOTE: This Smartwatch is only compatible wth Android Samrtphones. (Not compatible with Apple iPhones).
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product Very Good, Coming from Apple phone, and ultra watch
reviews.reviewText: Me love all things tech, phones/ watches, i just one day went from iPhone 13 Pro Max and Ultra watch: loved the phone: the watch is one of the best smart watches in the world, i just disliked the design: i love real watches: could never get over the look, for a watch lover: i wanted a change: but i know any huge technology company making phones or products that sell like Apple or Samsung to name a few make great products: most people are in one camp or another: me I look at technology more of a fluid connection: anyway: I decided to change over to a samsung phone and watch: and for me personally, loving it: great phone and love the watch: it looks like a real watch: which I love and the watch has everything on it and it does everything extremely well: technology to me is trying different things and benefit from that experience, love the watch: does everything and save money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I need
reviews.reviewText: I usually buy tech 2 or 3 years after it has came out and so I got this Samsung to have a Smartwatch. It is a Good Quality Smartwatch with Everything I need. One thing I like is it has many apps you can shop on Google Play just like a Phone. It has some interesting Health and Fitness Apps I haven't even delved into yet. I'm sure the ideas are numerous. I keep up with my Heart Rate, Daily Steps and I like an Analog with also Digital Time Face. I even got a nice Defender Type Watch Strap/Incasement for it to wear. The battery does need to be charged about once a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Could barely tell it was a renewed watch.
reviews.reviewText: Had to look hard to find any scratches. Watch looks, and performs great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love my watch. It would be perfect if it had more options for apps such as Facebook messenger, but that's not the watch it's the playstore. If it has that, it would be perfect to me. It has great sound quality if I ever play music or make calls from the watch and it has a decent range from my phone. It has great battery life as well. Overall I think it is a great product and is in excellent condition and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far so good ! was really nervous about buying renewed but for the price could not help myself. The watch i received is flawless. Strap is just ok but easily changed. the charger works great. First time i charged it it only lasted about 20 hours. I was disappointed but i fully charged it and it has been going for 28 hours and is at 46% so battery life looks like it is going to be great. First day was a lot of downloads and updates so that probably did it. So far everything is working and i am still learning how to use it. Very happy with my purchase and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far so good,fast delivery, easy to setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A Vintage Timepiece With Modern Flair: Samsung Classic Four Watch Review
reviews.reviewText: Rating: (3/5Review:As a tech enthusiast and lover of classic timepieces, I am thrilled to share my experience with the Samsung Classic Four Watch. This stunning watch seamlessly merges timeless elegance with contemporary technology, making it an absolute must-have for those who appreciate the best of both worlds.Design and Durability:The Classic Four Watch exudes sophistication with its sleek, circular stainless steel case and genuine leather strap. The attention to detail is remarkable, as each component feels meticulously crafted. The watch face is larger than many other smartwatches on the market, rendering it highly legible and enhancing the classic appeal. Despite its refined appearance, the Classic Four Watch is deceptively durable, successfully withstanding the wear and tear of daily use.Display and Interface:Featuring a vibrant and crisp AMOLED display, the Classic Four Watch delivers exceptional clarity and vivid colors, making it a pleasure to navigate through menus, notifications, and watch faces. The touch responsiveness is prompt, ensuring smooth interactions without any lag. Navigating the interface is straightforward, thanks to Samsung's user-friendly Tizen operating system.Performance and Features:Under the hood, the Classic Four Watch boasts powerful components that drive smooth performance. The smartwatch is equipped with a robust processor, generous RAM, and an ample amount of storage, allowing for seamless multitasking and quick app launches. The watch is packed with an array of useful features, including customizable watch faces, fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and NFC for contactless payments. The built-in GPS and Wi-Fi further enhance the watch's versatility.Battery Life:Samsung has done an excellent job in optimizing power consumption, as the Classic Four Watch offers impressive battery life. Even with frequent usage, the watch easily lasts through the day, eliminating the need for frequent recharges. When it does need charging, the included wireless charging dock makes the process a breeze.Connectivity and Compatibility:The Classic Four Watch seamlessly integrates with both Android and iOS devices, allowing users to access their calls, messages, and app notifications directly from their wrists. The Bluetooth connectivity is reliable, ensuring a stable connection with a smartphone without any noticeable delays.Conclusion:In a market flooded with smartwatches, the Samsung Classic Four Watch distinguishes itself with its timeless design, excellent craftsmanship, and a plethora of features that cater to the needs of modern consumers. Whether you're a fashion-conscious individual or a tech-savvy fitness enthusiast, this watch will undoubtedly impress. I wholeheartedly recommend the Samsung Classic Four Watch to anyone seeking a perfect blend of elegance and smart functionality.Very comfortable also

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Samsung Electronics Galaxy Watch 4 Classic
reviews.reviewText: Awesome watch. The battery last more than 8 hours, the apps are amazing. I love the way it fills on my wrist, watchfaces are various. I used to have an apple watch with an iphone, i gave away both of them, this watch for me is a lot lot lot better than the apple watch.I have absolutely nothing negative to say. Great product, great purchase
